caption: Zucchini flower tempura and calamari were both divine. Cocktails carry quite the punch. I enjoyed the ragu too, and the chef was extremely attentive to our issue with the Vongole. We’ll be back for sure.
Terrific Valentine Day dinner...great food, excellent service

I asked for lemonade, received alcohol.  Girlfriend asked for sparkling water, she did get what she asked for along with a mixed drink.  Neither one of us drink alcohol.  My well-done duck was red....
Excellent.

Squash blossoms were nothing short of amazing, and my wife, who happens to be one of the world's leading authorities on eggplant parm, called it "one of the absolute best she's ever had". Desserts both exceeded expectations as well - cannoli and a molten choclate cake - that simply could not have been better.  A real gem on MV and the best restaurant in Vineyard Haven, without question.

What a delicious surprise!! We had dinner last night and loved every bite! The host and waitstaff were friendly and we visited with the manager. Great wine selection ( including Cakebread Chardonnay) the Bruschetta was fabulous with 4 different toppings. Every one was mmmm worthy. I ordered the seafood and pasta with a light lemon butter sauce. Absolutely a must if you are in Vineyard Haven!!
Amazing, my new favorite restaurant.  All my guest's from Harbor Landing will enjoy a great atmosphere and real Italian food.
You get a lot of food. Very well seasoned and spiced. Atmosphere could use improvement. Fat kid happy.

Had dinner here twice.....the first night they stayed open so we could pick up after we got off the ferry.  Nothing else was open. (The island is a little funny off season and COVID)  A+.  The second night we were earlier and they remembered us.....always nice.  Great atmosphere a fun small space.  Super recommendation from the place we were staying.  Carol was super friendly and took great care of us.

Great food and amazing customer service. Not only were the drinks amazing but the food was also to die for. The chef was also a pleasure and we had a great time talking about sports! If ever back I will definitely eat here again!
The food is incredible!!
Absolutely loved it.  The antipasto platter was truly creative and delicious. 🇮🇹
One of the best Italian dinners I've ever had. Amazing food and service. I will be back and very highly recommend you eat here if your reading this review. You won't regret it!

Can't recall a better dinner I've had than Salvatore’s Pappardelle Duck. Our server was very personal and just the right amount of attentive. The bartender was amazing and we loved what he created, espresso martini is one of the best we’ve ever had and we highly recommend their signature cocktail Bella Ciao. Warm and romantic atmosphere. All in all, a wonderful experience, we will definitely come back!
Homemade Pasta, Great wine list, amazing service, great selection. By far one of the best Restaurants on Martha's Vineyard.
The spaghetti carbonara left me speechless, best meal I've ever had! I wish this place wasn't 5 hours away or I'd eat here all the time.
Great food, great staff. Salvatore came to greet us and we had a great time. Ordered duck with truffle oil, which each bite was worthy. Hope to be back next year!

I really, really wanted to try this place our first time on Martha’s Vineyard. My husband walked in around 6:15, albeit without a reservation and asked the hostess if we could wait for an outside table and that we would be quick.  We were told to come back around 8:15. As my husband came back out, another couple walked up. A host or Maitre D asked them if they had a reservation. They said no. I heard this with my own ears. He seated them at an outdoor table immediately.  We were 100% there first, a good five minutes before the other couple. I was pretty annoyed that they gave preferential treatment to people who arrived well after us and so I called and told them I was really looking forward to trying their restaurant. They offered no apology or anything, just said to come back and they would seat us indoors. As a food and travel blogger, being treated like this before I can even walk through the door is enough to turn me off forever.

Food and service were both amazing.  We went back a second night to try more dishes.  I highly recommend requesting the patio out back as well as Miona as your server.  She is so professional and phenomenal with great food and beverage recommendations. Highly recommend the squash blossom app, pasta Salvatore, and the pesto tortilini, as well as anything else Miona recommends.

The service was friendly and professional, the appetizers were very good, the course was ok. As with a lot of MV restaurants it's overpriced. Also need to answer the phone as we called a few times and no one answered.
Service and food were both exceptional!!!

The prices may shock you but I promise its worth it! Amazing service, relaxing atmosphere and the food is out of this world. The duck is by far the best meat I've ever eaten in my life and the scallops are cooked so beautifully it might even impress Gordon Ramsay himself. 1000000/10 we will be back again!!!
Excellent food and service! Nice little outside patio! Most definitely will be a repeat customer 👌
Mamma Mia this place is so good!!! I had the duck paparadelle and it was so good!!! Also the caprese!!! Oh!!! Great service too!

I am Italian and I go to the north end all the time and have experienced many Italian restaurants in my lifetime throughout the United  states and  even going to Italy. I had the Ragu and have to  say it was one of the best meals I have ever had! Highly recommend. Great service as well. very knowledgeable staff and friendly even when the restaurant was very busy. Very very impressed!!
Highly recommend food was perfect, staff was super friendly, amazing restaurant.

Incredible authentic Italian food. My wife and I enjoy our yearly trip to Martha’s Vineyard. Its nice to see Vineyard Haven has added to there list of restaurants, and boy this restaurant doesn’t disappoint. All ingredients are fresh and made to order from the drinks to the food. The owner/chief came out and asked how our meal was in a very busy atmosphere. We chatted and learned that he was Positano Italy which my wife and I visited over a year ago and made a instant connection with him. From the atmosphere, food, and personalization of every detail made our night an extra special one. This restaurant will do very well on the island. Would highly recommend. Already looking forward to dining and this restaurant on our visit to the island next year. Well done!
New place at MV. We had 6 different entrees and 2 starters and everything was exquisite. Dont miss the zucchini flowers and the duck.
We had a party of eight people last night (2 tables) every dish we had from stuffed squash to pork chop was superb! Service was impeccable! Highly recommend this restaurant

This restaurant saved the day, this is an absolute honest review, and I can’t say enough good words about this place. I went to Martha’s Vineyards thinking the food would be top notch!!! Coming from the North Shore Massachusetts I thought seafood would better or similar. I was utterly disappointed with most of the restaurants, and I tried quite a few of them. On the last day, while waiting for the ferry at the Vineyard terminal I walked to Salvatore’s Ristorante. Thank God, the food was amazing, the service was amazing, the place was amazing. If you go to Martha’s Vineyards and don’t go to Salvatore’s you haven’t been anywhere’s. This place is a must try.
We had a great meal at Salvatore's recently. The food and drinks were refreshing and proper Italian fare. Pasta was delicious.  I love Chef/owner restaurants and this fits the bill!
Great pasta, fresh ingredients. Sorry I didn’t discover it sooner. Absolutely loved it.
Best italian food I ever had, everything was prepared to perfection. The service was on point at all times, so friendly and genuine. Definitely can't wait to be back.

I ordered a seafood & pasta dish. It came with scallops shrimp and lobster all where the freshest I've had. The pasta was delicious. The owner took time to welcome and chat. I enjoyed the experience and will be back
